author: noonaut
content: Hello everyone, I'm not sure this is the right channel to ask this (please if there is a better one just LMK and I'll go there!). I'm working on integrating assertoor to the still in development [lambda-ethereum-consensus-client](https://github.com/lambdaclass/lambda_ethereum_consensus), I want to make sure the prereqs for integrating it given that it's outside of the known clients for assertoor and I'm getting a `error fetching sync status: get node syncing not supported` but we have a version of `/node/syncing` endpoint in place (There is a [WIP PR open ](https://github.com/lambdaclass/lambda_ethereum_consensus/pull/1324)reproducing it). Thanks in advance and sorry if this is the wrong place!

author: parithosh
content: Is your beacon api implimenation spec complaint? https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-apis
